parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[showWaypoint]] command. Possible values are:
* "NEVER" - never show it
* "EASY" - show only in cadet mode
* "ALWAYS" - always show it
* "ERROR" - when set to any different string 

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointShow''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]



</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - see description

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_wpShow = [[waypointShow]] [groupOne,1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showWaypoint]], [[waypoints]], [[waypointVisible]], [[setWaypointVisible]]
</value></part></template>
